```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  eval = TRUE,
  fig.width = 5,
  fig.asp = 0.618,
  out.width = "70%",
  dpi = 120,
  fig.align = "center",
  cache = FALSE
)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(broom))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(modelr))
diamonds <- readr::read_csv("data/sample_data.csv")
```

```{r}
diamond_1 <- diamonds %>%
  select(carat, cut, clarity, price)
```
```{r, fig.asp = 1, fig.width = 8, out.width = "100%"}
diamond_1 %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = cut:clarity,
               names_to = "measurement",
               values_to = "value") %>%
  ggplot() +
    geom_point(mapping = aes(x = value, y = price)) +
    facet_wrap(~ measurement, scales = "free_x")
```
```{r, fig.asp = 1, fig.width = 8, out.width = "100%"}
diamond_1 %>%
  ggplot() +
    geom_point(mapping = aes(x = carat, y = price))
```

```{r}
Diamond_model <- lm(price ~ carat, data = diamond_1)
```
```{r}
Diamond_model %>%
  tidy()
```
```{r}
Diamond_model %>%
  glance()
```
R squared is close to 1
